import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import TextareaAutosize from "react-textarea-autosize"; import axios from "axios"; import Tags from "./tags"; import {PlusIcon} from "@heroicons/react/24/outline"; const StageElem = () => { const [type,setType]=useState([]) const [tags,setTags]=useState([]) const [photo, setPhoto]=useState("") const [msg, setMsg]=useState("") const [dataTags,setDataTags]=useState([]) const [button, setButton]=useState(false) useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:8000/type/').then((res)=>setType(res.data)) axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:8000/tags/').then((res)=>setTags(res.data)) }, []); const onFileChange = (event) => { setPhoto(event.target.files[0]) } const uploadFileData = (event) => { setMsg("") const data = new FormData(); data.append('file', photo); axios.post('http://localhost:8000/img/upload', data).then((res) => { setMsg("Фото загружено") setPhoto(res.data.filename.filename) } ) } const onSelect=(event)=>{ setDataTags([...dataTags,{ tag_id:event.target.value, tag_name:event.nativeEvent.target[event.target.selectedIndex].text }]) setTags(tags.filter((elem)=>elem.tag_name !== event.nativeEvent.target[event.target.selectedIndex].text)) } return (
{photo !== "" ? : null}

{msg}

{dataTags.map(item => )} {dataTags.length <= 3 ? : null}
Описание этапа
Город
Место проведения
Дата проведения
Тип этапа
Партнеры
Alphard Group
Alphard Group
Alphard Group
); }; export default StageElem;
